Title: Il Sorpasso
Writer: Dino Risi (story and screenplay), Ettore Scola (story and screenplay), Ruggero Maccari (story and screenplay), Ettore Scola (dialogue), Ruggero Maccari (dialogue)
Actors: Vittorio Gassman, Catherine Spaak, Jean-Louis Trintignant, Claudio Gora
Plot: An impulsive braggart takes a shy law student for a two-day ride through the Roman and Tuscany countries.
